welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gelligaer, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Cardiff Airport caters to private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Fairwood Comm Airport's main terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
